results.text: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.
results.reason: Highlighting the superiority of trusting in the Lord over human beings.
results.reflection: Trusting in the Lord provides true refuge and security.

results.text: Trust in the Lord with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding.
results.reason: Encouraging complete trust in the Lord rather than relying on human wisdom.
results.reflection: Trusting in the Lord wholeheartedly leads to divine guidance.

results.text: Put not your trust in princes, in a son of man, in whom there is no salvation.
results.reason: Emphasizing the limitations of human leaders compared to God.
results.reflection: True salvation comes from placing our trust in God alone.

results.text: Trust in the Lord forever, for the Lord God is an everlasting rock.
results.reason: Affirming the stability and reliability of trusting in the eternal God.
results.reflection: God is our unchanging and firm foundation on which we can confidently rely.

results.text: Blessed is the man who trusts in the Lord, whose trust is the Lord.
results.reason: Highlighting the blessings of placing one's trust solely in the Lord.
results.reflection: True fulfillment and blessings come from trusting in the Lord wholeheartedly.
